name: Shan Hai Scrolls
description: No one can say who created the mysterious Shan Hai Scrolls, or when. All it takes is one glimpse to see the painting is a window to a world of magic and wonder, but perhaps it is more of a doorway?

skinlines.name: Shan Hai Scrolls
skinlines.description: Within the fabled Shan Hai Scrolls, gods and mythical creatures roam magical lands, wielding the power of the elements. Some are content to live with the palette they've been given, while others wish to jump beyond the borders and paint their lives with a new brush.
